title: Matchmaking problems
body: I was playing a ranked teams game with a couple of friends and we got matched against this team of gold to diamonds when we were all bronze with one silver. Our team got absolutely destroyed with a 71.5 % statistical chance that we would lose. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} Here is the game: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0On3k2bryhUSTdvc3BUODcyb0k/view?usp=sharing

replies.body:
Hey k4i 35,

Ranked 5's matchmaking is separate from Solo Queue matchmaking, so my best guess is that they and/or you were in placements for Ranked 5's. As you continue to play more games in placements and after placements, your MMR should start averaging out to where matches are more balanced and fair.
